about_the_game:
Welcome to New Haven: Where Secrets Unfold

Synopsis:
In the distant future, humanity clings to survival within the sprawling colony of New Haven. As an intrepid warrior, you wield both weapon and technology, guided by your enigmatic partner, Iris. Together, you unravel the mysteries of this fractured world, battling guardians, monsters, deciphering lore, and confronting the very fabric of reality in this pixelated 2D sci-fi ARPG
Features:
  • Iris, your AI companion, provides guidance, lore insights, and analysis. Conversations with Iris shape your choices, quests, and your understanding of New Haven’s past.
Dynamic Regions:
  • Explore diverse biomes: from the neon-lit streets of Neo-Haven to the overgrown ruins. Each region teems with life, danger, and hidden passages.
Dungeon Delving:
  • Descend into ancient vaults, forgotten laboratories, and subterranean labyrinths. Each dungeon holds relics, puzzles, and a guardian to prevent your advancement
Item Collection:
  • Collect artifacts, enhancements, weaponry , and items to propel you forward.

Uncover the Underlying Truth

New Haven pulses with energy—an enigma waiting to be unraveled.
Prepare, explorer. The secrets of New Haven await your wits.
________________________________________
May your journey through New Haven be filled with wonder, danger, and revelation!

name: The Colony: New Haven Chronicles Demo
short_description: Top down action adventure game set in the fictional world of New Haven. Game play elements include an open world, interacting with NPCs, explore regions with their own dungeons to uncover what is transpiring on New Haven.
